verbose_text: Recently, importance of increasing endothelial tip cell formation and arteriolar branching by miR-30a expression and downregulation of endothelial DLL4, a target of miR-30a and an inhibitor of tip cell formation, regarding the microvascular rarefaction process in hypertension \ nwere reported [XREF_BIBR].
evidence: expression and downregulation of endothelial DLL4
